bibl.title: John Matthews v. Henry M. White. Type of Document
bibl.note: Our transcription is based on a digital image of the microfilmed original.

org.orgName: District Court of the United States for the Western District of Washington

body.p: US DEPARTMENT OF LABOR IMMIGRATION SERVICE DISTRICT NO.16
DISTRICT HEADQUARTERS U.S. COMMISSIONER OF IMMIGRATION SEATTLE, WASH.
Commissioner General of Immigration, Washington, D.C.

Referring tothe Bureau's letter 54904/149 of the 27th ultime, I inclose herewith two copies of the record of the hearing accorded YAN METVEYEFF, alias JOHN MATTHEWS, and an application for a Ukranian passport, together with a number of photgraphs.

Acting upon the advice of his attorney the alien refused to sign the application for a passport. The attorney expressed the opinion that it was not incumbent upon the alien to assist this service in connection with any matter having to do with the alien's deportation, and that it was his intention to immediately institute habeas corpus proceedings.
